product_name: Thorlo Experia CoolMax Mini-Crew Socks - Men's
long_description: Powered by Thorlo padding and tailored for performance and minimal bulk, runners will appreciate the lightweight and supportive fit of the Experia CooMax Mini-Crew socks. 66% CoolMax(R) polyester content, along with regular polyester, works to wick moisture away from feet to keep them comfortable and dry. Nylon and Lycra(R) spandex provide a glovelike fit and lightweight support across instep and arch. Sculpted pads in the balls and heels provide protection from shear and impact; all but the most essential padding is eliminated to reduce bulk and weight. Lightweight Achilles tendon pad protects against chafing and functions as a heel lock. Flat knit toe seam increases comfort. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Powered by Thorlo padding and tailored for performance and minimal bulk, runners will appreciate the lightweight and supportive fit of the Experia CooMax Mini-Crew socks.
